pack.tacz.emx_cust.name: §6CUST Gunsmith
emxcust.ammo.emx_cus_tool.name: §6“Super Gunsmith 2.0” Tool Box
emxcust.ammo.emx_cus_tool.tooltip:
§e【crafting materials/non-ammunition】
§7A civilian gunsmith's tool kit for weapon modification
is like a gun's wardrobe. Fully automatic,
armor-piercing high-explosive, and with a cool
appearance, the gunsmith can modify them all.
Of course, it might not be legal. Keep it low-key!
trisdyna.gun.tris_sf7e_wa.name: §6Ares SF7E “WhiteAres”
trisdyna.gun.tris_sf7e_wa.desc:
§6【Customs】§eSF7E-WhiteAres
§7Burst forth, swift as light.
§8§o“Ares-Ion”Original Color Scheme
trisdyna.gun.fl3e_sd.name: §6FL-3E “SnowSymphony”
trisdyna.fl3e_sd.desc:
§6【Customs】§eFL3E-24Christmas
§7It fires lasers, making
you a red-suited Santa.
emxarms.gun.emx_mk951r_ba.name: §6CMR-951 “BlueDemon”
emxarms.gun.emx_mk951r_ba.desc:
§6【Customs】§eCMR951-BlueDemon
§bBefore drawing cards, please use strawberry
§bmilk to appease the machine spirit.
emxarms.gun.emx_draftsman_ev.name: §6SAIG-24HE “Evil-157”
emxarms.gun.emx_draftsman_ev.desc:
§6【Customs】§eEvil-157 AM
§7No system is absolutely safe
§7The biggest security vulnerability is humans

emxarms.gun.emx_mg57_yh.desc:

§7When your opponent hears the burst of thick heavy firing
they should regret why they didn't take cover sooner!
emxarms.gun.emx_kund50ex_al.desc:
§6【Customs】§ePolar Explorer - PRINTSTREAM
§7Only with eagle-eye precision and determination,
you can control life and death!

but from the change of bullet type used.

emxarms.gun.emx_pulse_sc.desc:

Using costly holographic projections for anime images
is not recommended unless you're wealthy.

girl, delivering badass firepower to her foes

emxcust.emx_cust.desc:
§7Folk artisans' stage. They call it 'art,' like
live-streaming illegal gun mods and crafting
Draconic Reactors from Cardboard Boxes.
